original_text: In building the temple, only blocks dressed at the quarry were used, and no hammer, chisel or any other iron tool was heard at the temple site while it was being built.
korean_text: 이 성전은 건축할 때에 돌을 그 뜨는 곳에서 다듬고 가져다가 건축하였으므로 건축하는 동안에 성전 속에서는 방망이나 도끼나 모든 철 연장 소리가 들리지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: only blocks dressed at the quarry were used
and no hammer, chisel or any other iron tool
sentences.korean_translation: 망치, 정이나 다른 어떤 철 연장도

sentences.original_text: was heard at the temple site
